DOC.brief_summary: Radiofrequency emmitting device, normaly used for thermage treatments will be used on 22 mild to moderate acne patients faces. The aim of the study is to check whether RF heating of subcutaneous and dermis will improve acne in needed patients.
DOC.brief_title: The Treatment of Acne Vulgaris With Radiofrequency Device
DOC.criteria: mildmoderate Acne age over 18 otherwise healthy age under 18 pregnancy systemic acne treatment in the last month local acne treatment in the last month
